title: Elon's Empire Struggles, Trump's Crypto Summit, and IPO Slump
summary:
Kara and Scott are live at SXSW â€” taking shots and dancing around like Elon (okay, that's just Scott). They discuss how Elon's business empire is struggling, and how much money DOGE is really saving. Then, Trump's crypto summit, and his plan to create a Bitcoin reserve. Plus, as the IPO slump continues, will any major company go public this year?
